name: Idle Candy Land
description:
Immerse yourself in the world of the Nammis and help them rebuild Candy Land!

After their beloved Candy Land is destroyed by a mysterious villain, the Nammis stand without their home and hope of recovery. Now it's up to you! Can you help the Nammis rebuild Candy Land and bring them back to old prosperity and happiness?

- Produce over 25 different, delicious sweets.

- Hire helpers to automate production.

- The Nammis keep working for you even when you're not there.

- Complete tasks and unlock cute outfits

- Build houses for the Nammis

- Take care of the needs of the Nammis or they will become dissatisfied.

- Erect buildings to entertain the Nammis and provide them with food

- Explore different continents, each with a different theme

Play anywhere! - You can play for free at any time, even without an internet connection

Candy Land Adventures is free, however, some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.

Do you like Candy Land Adventures? Learn more about the game!
